name: Ratribution
description:
This game was developed during a seven week school project at Yrgo, a swedish higher vocational education school. STORY

The owlians have hunted and oppressed the rats for millenia. Making them live in fear, in slums of the world. It is time to stop them once and for all! As a ritualistic experiment, the rats have achieved the ultimate weapon. You!

IT IS ALL ABOUT DESTRUCTION

Destroy everything in sight, feel the might, make the Owlians flee in flight. 

CHOOSE HOW TO DESTROY

Use your fist and kicks, or roll into an army of unsuspecting owls. Explosion barrels? Sure we have it! Pick them up and throw them! Move through each level of the city, moving towards your final target, The Mother Tree.

CREDITS Artists:
  • Edvin Edenhage
  • Jonathan Dewoon
  • Maja Dandebo
  • Vilma Gustafsson
Programmers:
  • Marcus Kolbe
  • Maya Wingårdh
  • Viktor Andersson
